availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jarvis Gladding Cady (Mason County, KY, merchant, clerk, & US Police Captain)

body.p: Maysville, Kentucky, merchant, clerk, and law enforcement officer. Providence, Rhode Island, native. Son of John Cleveland Cady and Lucy Morris Nichols Cady. Married to Mary Louise Mitchell Cady in Mason County on November 23, 1854. Father of Mary L. Cady, William Frank Cady, and Andrew M. Cady. Merchant in Mason County in 1860. Clerk at Pearce & Son, Cincinnati, Ohio, in 1863. U. S. police captain in 1865.
